house_listing.house_description: New construction inventory. 4br transitional 2-story w/lr/dr fp, huge eat-in kit w/pantry. 9'ceil's 1st fl & 2-story entry foyer. Mastbedrm incredible w/2 w-i closets & sitting rm. Nearly complete-buyers can still select flooring. Call agt's or visit model-office for details.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Foyer, Pantry, Walk-In Closet(s)
